file.name: different_file_reference_from_file.spec.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Test specification for the translating parser
  version: 0.0.0
paths:
  /hosts:
    get:
      responses:
        default:
          description: A file reference to a different file reference
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'different_file_reference_from_file_schemas1.spec.yaml#/$defs/RefObject'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /hosts: get: responses: default: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: resolve "different_file_reference_from_file_schemas1.spec.yaml#/$defs/RefObject": external "different_file_reference_from_file_schemas1.spec.yaml": file: local file reference is not allowed
